name: Hud Scale Down - ShortCutBar
description:
Just make the Shortcutbar a little smaller, a little lower down on the screen and a little bit of transparency.

Nothing wild ....

It's my personal touch. I was looking for HUD scaling back then because Funcom somehow forgot about it. Never found anything ... until a few hours ago. But that does not fit me so ...

The Hud Scale Down elements are "all" individual.
